title: Learn spell
description: Magic Spells is the third live album from the Brazilian progressive rock band Apocalypse released on Financiarte label. The album is part of the Apocalypse 25th Anniversary Box Set and was recorded during the Apocalypse tour in 2016. The album was released on 18 October 2016 by Apocalypse Records.
metadesc: Magic Spells is the third live album from the Brazilian progressive rock band Apocalypse released on Financiarte label.
author: Kusal
